title: Studies on the activity of the pituitary-gonadal axis in the XYY syndrome
abstract: Synopsis Results are presented of pituitary gonadotrophic and testicular steroid hormone assays carried out on 11 phenotypic males with a 47, XYY karyotype. These results are compared with those from a control group of normal ambulant males and a group of patients with a 46, XY karyotype who were detained in a maximum security hospital.
